alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 11:47PM EDT until June 15 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1046 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Chipley to 13 miles southwest of Vernon, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lynn Haven, Callaway, Vernon, Bonifay, Springfield, Hiland Park, Altha, Wausau, Ebro, Moose Pond, Southport, Fountain, Singer Road, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Holmes Valley and Gainer Spring. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.
